name: Curebase
headline: End-to-end clinical trial execution built on cutting-edge software.
description: Curebase is reinventing decentralized clinical trials to help the vast majority of potential patients that currently cannot access clinical research. Curebase’s vision is that any patient, no matter where they are located, should be able to participate in clinical trials at home and with their own doctors. This is made possible through a unique suite of tools, including all-in-one eClinical software and virtual research sites, designed to engage patients in clinical trials across all settings, be it at home, at their local clinic, or other places in their community.

# The AI-Native Platform for
![Curebase is the AI-native platform for modern clinical research, with next-gen eClinical technology across ePRO/eCOA, eConsent, EDC, and Decentralized Clinical Trials / Engagement tools. ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b121ccc66088a56a8df080/670e94f21a5871f1144fc8d7_image%204.svg)
# Modern Clinical Research
Experience eClinical software built with AI at its core. Deliver faster study launches, higher quality data, and superior engagement.
[Schedule a Demo](http://www.curebase.com/</schedule-a-demo>)[Explore the Platform](http://www.curebase.com/<#our-products>)
# Trusted by Industry-Leading Teams
Trusted by

# Our Platform
[ePRO/eCOAUltraconfigurable, modern software that delivers unmatched user experience for both researchers and participants—easily designed and deployed with AI.Learn More![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b121ccc66088a56a8df080/663bba8d359b7deb5ee5852d_Vector.png)](http://www.curebase.com/</ePRO-eCOA>)[eConsentBuild user-friendly, paperless experiences that support multiple devices, languages, countries, and complex workflows.Learn More![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b121ccc66088a56a8df080/663bba8d359b7deb5ee5852d_Vector.png)](http://www.curebase.com/</econsent>)[Unified participant experienceTake patients from prescreening through to patient portal and data submission in a single mobile experience.Learn More![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b121ccc66088a56a8df080/663bba8d359b7deb5ee5852d_Vector.png)](http://www.curebase.com/</participant-experience>)[EDCUnified data platform for hybrid and site-based studies. User-centric data collection meets powerful monitoring and data management capabilities with AI embedded throughout.Learn More![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b121ccc66088a56a8df080/663bba8d359b7deb5ee5852d_Vector.png)](http://www.curebase.com/</edc>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b121ccc66088a56a8df080/663bbcf5bb42113757165fdb_Group%20100922.webp)
![Curebase platform - Data](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b121ccc66088a56a8df080/665f57689ac8cc7c89902dd3_ePRO_Devices.webp)
# Make quality data collection your strength, and never miss a data point.
Deliver an ePRO and eCOA experience at the highest standards. Capture accurate data exactly as you need it, and engage patients with a targeted notification campaign to make dropoff a thing of the past.
[Learn about Curebase ePRO/eCOA](http://www.curebase.com/</ePRO-eCOA>)
![Curebase platform - eConsent](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b121ccc66088a56a8df080/664dfaa2ea25902270127aa9_Group%2082%20\(4\).webp)
# Give patients the flexibility they deserve with highly configurable eConsent.
Configure everything from fully remote consent to site-based and between, with multi-language, LAR, pediatric, and site-level customizability.
[Learn about Curebase Consent](http://www.curebase.com/</econsent>)
![Curebase platform ePRO](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b121ccc66088a56a8df080/666a0c1c73256ebc195961a9_ePRO-collage-2.webp)
# Stay on top of your study with the powerful reporting needed to run a study at scale.
Getting insight should be simple. Empower sites to stay on top of every patient’s status in the study and leverage powerful in-app notifications and communication.
[Schedule a Demo](http://www.curebase.com/<#bottom-form>)
# Think bigger than ePRO/eCOA. Craft a unified digital patient experience that users will love.
![Curebase platform - patient portal](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b121ccc66088a56a8df080/663c8243cb8ee42d5303d37a_Frame%202664.webp)
![Curebase platform - onboarding ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b121ccc66088a56a8df080/663c824346ec9b24400f8213_Frame%202663.webp)
![Curebase platform ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b121ccc66088a56a8df080/663c8243572c82bd285d88c2_Frame%202665.webp)
![Curebase platform - telemedicine ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b121ccc66088a56a8df080/664f6fcb22e2015684e5c203_Frame%202666%20\(3\).webp)
## Launch your study faster
Curebase's study designer enables complex builds, optimized for every step of the participant experience. Choose self-service or go fully-outsourced—it's your call.
[![Wistia video thumbnail](https://embed-ssl.wistia.com/deliveries/15ebfde8d7c6283f2120722d679e3164.webp?image_crop_resized=960x540)](http://www.curebase.com/<https:/embed-ssl.wistia.com/deliveries/a8fbc664b4e8ea6eefdb7a07b93cc39397005a0c.bin>)
[Schedule a Demo](http://www.curebase.com/</schedule-a-demo>)
## Curebase Success in Action
500 mothers in an infant health medical device study were recruited in just 3 months. The study was launched in just 6 weeks and 95% of patients completed the study submitting all of their core endpoint data.
![Study compliance](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b121ccc66088a56a8df080/663c97671f20a8d40aba0f2b_Group%20104.webp)
## Connect with Curebase

generated_description:
Curebase is a forward-thinking healthcare company revolutionizing the clinical trial landscape with its pioneering approach to decentralized trials. Founded in 2017 and backed by Y Combinator (Batch S18), Curebase emerged with a mission: to make clinical trials accessible for every patient, regardless of their location. Imagine a world where anyone can participate in research without having to travel to a clinical site. That's the vision driving this San Francisco-based company.

At the heart of Curebase's offering is an all-in-one eClinical software platform that integrates cutting-edge technology to facilitate seamless, end-to-end clinical trial execution. This AI-native platform is designed to engage participants from the comfort of their homes, allowing them to connect with healthcare providers and clinical teams without the usual barriers.

The company has cultivated a robust ecosystem of tools, providing solutions like ePRO/eCOA (electronic Patient Reported Outcomes/electronic Clinical Outcomes Assessments), eConsent, and a unified participant experience that encapsulates the entire process from prescreening to data submission. With over 118 team members, they are not just about technology; they're passionate about creating a user-friendly environment that blends clinical research with everyday healthcare.

It's impressive to see the impact they’ve made. In a short span, Curebase has engaged 250,000 participants, collected over 8.4 million data points, and powered 83 studies—all while ensuring high compliance rates. They are trusted by leading industry teams and are actively driving advancements in research methodologies.

Curebase isn’t just a tech company; it’s a bridge between patients and the future of medicine. They believe that the digital age should empower patients to take part actively in trials and transform data collection, simplifying the complex processes often associated with clinical research.

If you're curious to learn more, you can check out their offerings on their [website](http://www.curebase.com). Whether you're a patient wanting to participate or a researcher looking for innovative solutions, Curebase is leading the charge toward a more inclusive clinical research environment.
